column4: does anyone know of a package manager besides synaptic which is actually able to save my selections?
hey does anyone know of a lightweight alternative to gdm thats in the breezy ubuntu repositories?
xdm, kdm, gdm -- the three great ones. xdm is ugly, but should also be lighter
So if I put xdm on, and remove gdm and gnome but keep gtk (if thats possible) then I can still run all my gnome apps?
